mutants.original_line: lower_bound = ord('a') if c.islower() else ord('A')
mutants.mutated_line: lower_bound = ord('') if c.islower() else ord('A')

mutants.original_line: lower_bound = ord('a') if c.islower() else ord('A')
mutants.mutated_line: lower_bound = ord('a') if c.islower() else ord('')

mutants.original_line: decrypted_words = [''.join(decrypt_char(c, key) for c in word) for word in s]
mutants.mutated_line: decrypted_words = ['MUTATED'.join((decrypt_char(c, key) for c in word)) for word in s]
